critique: This document pertains to the administration and regulation of the Army and Navy hospital at Hot Springs, Arkansas. It delegates presidential authority to the Secretary of the Army to establish rules and regulations for the hospital, ensuring uniformity with other Army hospitals. The order maintains existing regulations until amended by the Secretary of the Army. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration approach, expansion of executive power, federalism implications, national security concerns, economic regulation, or social inclusion aspects. Therefore, most axes should be scored as neutral.
